data.comment: The match has started.
Free kick for Strasbourg in the half of Angers.
In the minute 2, Ball safe as Angers is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Bastein Dechepy awards the home team a throw-in.
Can Angers capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Strasbourg's half?
In the minute 5, Angers awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Angers to take a throw-in in Strasbourg territory.
Bastein Dechepy signals a Angers throw-in in Strasbourg's half.
In the minute 6, Free kick in a good position for Angers!
Bastein Dechepy signals a free kick to Strasbourg.
Angers awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 9, Free kick Angers.
Throw-in for Strasbourg in their own half.
Throw-in Angers.
In the minute 11, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Angers are in shooting range from this free kick.
In the minute 12, Can Angers capitalize from this dangerous free kick?
Alexander Djiku is booked for the away team.
Angelo Fulgini (Angers) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Throw-in for Angers in the half of Strasbourg.
In the minute 15, Free kick for Strasbourg in their own half.
Ball goes out of play for a Strasbourg goal kick.
At Stade Raymond Kopa, Angers are penalized for being offside.
In the minute 17, Strasbourg have been awarded a corner by Bastein Dechepy.
Bastein Dechepy signals a free kick to Strasbourg in their own half.
Can Strasbourg get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Angers's half?
In the minute 19, Bastein Dechepy signals a Angers throw-in in Strasbourg's half.
Bastein Dechepy awards Strasbourg a goal kick.
Angers needs to be cautious. Strasbourg have an attacking throw-in.
In the minute 21, Throw-in for Strasbourg at Stade Raymond Kopa.
Throw-in for Angers in their own half.
Can Angers get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Strasbourg's half?
In the minute 23, Angers have a dangerous throw-in.
In Angers a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Strasbourg drives forward and Jeanricner Bellegarde gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
In the minute 26, Angers to take a throw-in in Strasbourg territory.
Throw-in for Angers close to the penalty box.
Strasbourg awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 30, Strasbourg are pushing forward but Kenny Lala's finish is wide of the goal.
Angers have a goal kick.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Angers.
In the minute 32, Bastein Dechepy signals a throw-in for Strasbourg, close to Angers's area.
Ball safe as Angers is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Free kick for Angers in their own half.
In the minute 34, Throw-in Angers.
Bastein Dechepy signals a free kick to Angers in their own half.
Farid El Melali for Angers drives towards goal at Stade Raymond Kopa. But the finish is unsuccessful.
In the minute 39, Bastein Dechepy signals a free kick to Strasbourg in their own half.
Goal kick for Angers at Stade Raymond Kopa.
Throw-in high up the field for Angers in Angers.
In the minute 43, Corner awarded to Angers.
Angers drive upfield and Ismael Traore gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Strasbourg defender.
Free kick for Angers in their own half.
In the minute 44, Throw-in for Strasbourg at Stade Raymond Kopa.
Bastein Dechepy awards the away team a throw-in.
Free kick for Angers in the half of Strasbourg.
In the minute 45, 1 minutes will be added to the 1st half.
Angers have been awarded a corner by Bastein Dechepy.
Corner awarded to Angers.
In the minute 45, The whistle has gone to end the first-half.
The second-half is now underway.
Angers make their first substitution with Jimmy Cabot replacing Farid El Melali.
In the minute 47, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Throw-in for Strasbourg in the half of Angers.
Throw-in high up the field for Strasbourg in Angers.
In the minute 50, Strasbourg advance rapidly upfield but Bastein Dechepy blows for offside.
Angers awarded a free kick in their own half.
Angers awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 51, Angers have been awarded a corner by Bastein Dechepy.
Goal kick for Angers at Stade Raymond Kopa.
Throw-in for Strasbourg in their own half.
In the minute 54, Strasbourg awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in for Angers in the half of Strasbourg.
Bastein Dechepy signals a Strasbourg throw-in in Angers's half.
In the minute 61, Angers awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Bastein Dechepy awards the home team a throw-in.
Lois Diony is replacing Stephane Bahoken for Angers at Stade Raymond Kopa.
In the minute 63, Stephane Moulin (Angers) is making a third substitution, with Pierrick Capelle replacing Angelo Fulgini.
Corner awarded to Angers.
Romain Thomas gets his shot on target but fails to score for Angers.
In the minute 65, Angers have been awarded a corner by Bastein Dechepy.
Ludovic Ajorque is on a sub for Majeed Waris for Strasbourg.
The away team have replaced Jeanricner Bellegarde with Mehdi Chahiri. This is the second substitution made today by Thierry Laurey.
In the minute 68, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Free kick Angers.
The match has been stopped briefly for attention to the injured Mohamed Simakan.
Strasbourg's Mohamed Simakan is back in action after a slight knock.
In the minute 69, Thierry Laurey is making the team's third substitution at Stade Raymond Kopa with Dimitri Lienard replacing Mohamed Simakan.
Throw-in for Angers at Stade Raymond Kopa.
In the minute 71, Angers to take a throw-in in Strasbourg territory.
Can Angers get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Strasbourg's half?
Ball safe as Strasbourg is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 71, Free kick for Strasbourg in their own half.
It's getting dangerous! Free kick for Strasbourg close to the penalty box.
Souleyman Doumbia for Angers has been booked by Bastein Dechepy and receives a first yellow card.
In the minute 73, Bastein Dechepy signals a free kick to Angers in their own half.
Throw-in for Angers in the half of Strasbourg.
Goal! Habib Diallo gives Strasbourg a 0-1 lead.
In the minute 78, It's a goal kick for the away team in Angers.
Bastein Dechepy signals a Angers throw-in in Strasbourg's half.
Ball goes out of play for a Strasbourg goal kick.
In the minute 81, Bastein Dechepy awards Strasbourg a goal kick.
The home team replace Mathias Pereira Lage with Mohamed Ali Cho.
In the minute 82, Free kick for Strasbourg in their own half.
Sada Thioub is replacing Thomas Mangani for the home team.
Throw-in Angers.
Strasbourg awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 85, In Angers a free kick has been awarded the home team.
In Angers Angers attack through Jimmy Cabot. The finish is off target, however.
Strasbourg have a goal kick.
In the minute 87, Corner awarded to Strasbourg.
Can Angers get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Strasbourg's half?
Strasbourg awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 89, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Angers to take a throw-in in Strasbourg territory.
Strasbourg have a goal kick.
At Stade Raymond Kopa the fourth official shows that 5 minutes will be added to the 2nd half.
Bastein Dechepy signals a throw-in for Strasbourg, close to Angers's area.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Bastein Dechepy signals a free kick to Angers in their own half.
Full-time! The final score is 0-2.
Great finish from Ludovic Ajorque to give Strasbourg a 0-2 lead.
Thierry Laurey (Strasbourg) is making a fourth substitution, with Mahame Siby replacing Adrien Thomasson.
Strasbourg make their fifth substitution with Lucien Kevin Zohi replacing Habib Diallo.
At Stade Raymond Kopa, Ludovic Ajorque has been yellow-carded for the away team.
